reviewText: I own all of the Trek Ireland DVDs -- I use them when I'm on the treadmill. They show the out-of-the-way places not normally visited by tourist buses. They're recorded at a walking pace, but, of course, you can set your own pace on the treadmill. Michael explains a lot of the local lore as he goes, but you can ignore the option if you wish and just continue on your way. I'm waiting for the next ones.
